page.title: 07Rolleston Shops
page.content: The Newsagent The present owner of the shop has been in the village for twelve years.She enjoyes her job because she meets lots of people but she dislikes working on Sundays,people who know it all and the dust off the newspapers.Her shop is important to the village because it provides a service in delivering newspapers which would otherwise be unavailable.This shop sells refreshments,newspapers,comics,and provides a meeting place for many people. Lakeland Stores This shop is opposite the spinney.The two owners work there.It is a general store and they get there food supplies and general wares from Cash and Carry; the frozen food is delivered.
